name: Flying Cube (Lodaing Man)
description: This game is a kind of simple parkour riddle game we will make mysterious events as the game progresses   Controls:                         Walk the arrow keys .               Up Arrow and forward arrow jump forward .                     Up Arrow and back arrow jump back.                                                As a virus. Detects the game. To download the game, turn off the virus scanner of Windows or if you have an external anti-virus.
